code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const sections=[{title:"Today's Appointments",color:"primary",path:"/appointments",icon:"bi-calendar-check"},{title:"Manage Staff Attendance",color:"secondary",path:"/staffattendancecard",icon:"bi-person-check"},{title:"Manage Services",color:"success",path:"/servicesCard",icon:"bi-tools"},{title:"Manage gallary",color:"danger",path:"/Uploadpage",icon:"bi-images"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'200px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center mb-4 fw-bold text-uppercase",children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row justify-content-center",children:sections.map((section,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card shadow-lg border-0 bg-".concat(section.color," text-white"),onClick:()=>navigate(section.path),style:{cursor:"pointer",transition:"transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s"},onMouseEnter:e=>e.currentTarget.style.transform="scale(1.05)",onMouseLeave:e=>e.currentTarget.style.transform="scale(1)",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi ".concat(section.icon," display-4 mb-3")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title fw-bold",children:section.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:section.description})]})})},index))})]});};export default AdminDashboard;
